name: nfres
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: nfcxfr(s0, cres(c0, c1), cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cres(c0, c1), cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))
-| wnfc(s0, cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cres(c0, c1), cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))
-| wnfc(s0, cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))

|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cin(c0, cxp(c1, universe)))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, cxp(c1, universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, cxp(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cxp(c1, universe))
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wnfc(s0, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| wnfc(s0, universe)

|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, universe)

|- wnfc(s0, cres(c0, c1))
-| wnfc(s0, c0)
-| wnfc(s0, c1)

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for restriction. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2003.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
